Description: Upper part of a blue-glazed composition plaque or miniature stela, decorated on one face with part of a scene showing Prince Ahmose Sapair seated holding a lotus-flower, before a table of offerings. In front are three vertical columns of hieroglyphs, including his name. All decoration in black. Repaired from three pieces. Chipped at the top.
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Ahmose Sapair
